attributes.action: We want more than one televised EU Referendum debates on more than one channel.
attributes.additional_details: This decision is as important as a General Election, our last General Election received the necessary airtime with a good selection of debates, this huge decision is critical to the UK's future and once again the UK's public has a difficult decision to make.
attributes.background:
The EU Referendum is one of the most important decisions in UK history, a once in a lifetime decision that is to be made by the UK's population. 
It is imperative that this subject is properly debated on multi TV channels to ensure that the widest audience is met.

rejection.details: It is a decision for the TV companies to schedule any debates on this subject and to invite people to take part in any programmes.
